pages.text: Crops in Cuisine Mod are planted and harvested in the same fashion as that of $(em)wheat$(). However, there are a few exceptions - if you see some descriptions regarding $(em)special plants type$() in tooltip, it means you may want to refer to the following pages for correct ways to plant them.

pages.title: Hellish Crops
pages.text: Hellish Crops such as chili peppers must be planted on $(em)soul sand$().

pages.title: Watery Crops
pages.text: Watery Crops such as rice must be planted in $(em)one-block-deep water$(), where the bottom has to be $(em)dirt$().

pages.title: "Crops from plain"
pages.text: Crops from plain such as bamboo shoots must be planted on $(em)dirt$(). $(br2)$(em)Bamboo$() will spread shoots at its surroundings $(em)after raining$(); tilled farmland has a higher possibility to grow new bamboo shots. Bamboo will stop spearing new shoots after several seasons.
